login.title: Login
login.description: Whether you're new or a veteran, keep your ENK finances in check.

signup.title: Create Account
signup.description: Join ENK Pilot and take full control of your ENK finances.
signup.success: Check your email to complete your registration
signup.termsRequired: You must accept the terms to proceed
signup.termsDialogDescription: Please read through and scroll to the bottom to accept.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.success: Reset link has been sent to your email

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.description: Choose a new and secure password for your account.

overview.healthDescription: Live overview of your sole proprietorship's financial health.

receipts.title: Receipt Upload
receipts.description: Snap or upload a photo of your receipt for instant OCR processing.
receipts.dragDrop: Drag and drop or click to upload

receiptEdit.title: Edit Receipt
receiptEdit.description: Update the vendor name, amount, date, and category for this receipt. You can choose from suggested categories or create your own.
receiptEdit.vendorHint: Choose from suggestions or type your own
receiptEdit.categoryHint: Choose from suggestions or type your own

deadlines.title: Tax Deadlines
deadlines.description: Track your MVA and Forskuddsskatt payment deadlines

healthCheck.title: Tax Health Check
healthCheck.projectedConflictSubtitle: Based on your current profit, we project your annual profit will be {projected} NOK.
healthCheck.recommendation: We recommend increasing your annual prepaid tax by {amount} NOK to avoid a back-tax penalty next year.
healthCheck.recommendationDecrease: You are projected to pay more tax than required. You can decrease your annual prepaid tax by {amount} NOK to improve cash flow.
healthCheck.onTrackSubtitle: Your tax plan matches your projected earnings perfectly.
healthCheck.underEarningSubtitle: Based on your YTD profit, we project your annual profit will be {projected} NOK.
healthCheck.setupRequiredSubtitle: Enter your expected profit in settings to enable real-time monitoring.

calculator.grossIncomeDescription: Enter your gross income for this transaction.
calculator.profitDescription: This is yours to keep after taxes.
calculator.mvaThresholdDescription: Your total income has crossed 50,000 NOK. In Norway, this means you are now liable for MVA (VAT). You must register in the MVA Register immediately.
calculator.mvaGuideStep1: 1. Send your invoice as usual (without MVA for now).
calculator.mvaGuideStep2: 2. Go to Altinn/Skatteetaten and apply for MVA registration.
calculator.mvaGuideStep3: 3. Once approved, you must start adding 25% MVA to all future invoices.
calculator.mvaReportDescription: Summary for your bi-monthly MVA return to Skatteetaten.
calculator.upgradeToUseCurrency: Upgrade to Pro to record income in USD, EUR, and more with live exchange rates.
calculator.fallbackNotice: We couldn't reach Norges Bank for live rates. Using an estimated approximate rate instead.

taxSync.title: Tax Configuration
taxSync.description: Set manually or scan your "Skattekort" PDF locally.
taxSync.note: Note: All PDF processing stays in your browser. We never see your documents.
taxSync.detected: Detected {rate}% from PDF! Click save to confirm.
taxSync.detectedMulti: Detected {rate}% tax rate and {salary} NOK in external salary! Click save to confirm.
taxSync.notFound: Could not find tax rate in this PDF. Please enter it manually.
taxSync.readFailed: Failed to read PDF locally. Please enter tax rate manually.
taxSync.invalidRate: Please enter a valid tax rate.

settingsPage.title: Settings
settingsPage.description: Manage your account preferences and security.
settingsPage.defaultLocaleDescription: Choose your preferred language for when you log in.
settingsPage.businessDescription: Manage your ENK status and tax context.
settingsPage.mvaDescription: Enable this if you are registered in the MVA Register.
settingsPage.prepaidDetected: Detected {amount} NOK in prepaid tax! Click save to apply.
settingsPage.prepaidNotFound: No amount found in PDF. Please enter manually.
settingsPage.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently remove your account and all associated data.
settingsPage.deleteAccountWarning: Warning: This action is irreversible after 30 days. If you delete your account, you will have 30 days to log back in to reactivate it. After that, all your data will be permanently purged.
settingsPage.deleteAccountConfirm: To confirm, please type "DELETE MY ACCOUNT" in the box below:
settingsPage.deleteAccountReactivate: If you access your account within 30 days, it will be reactivated automatically.
settingsPage.deleteAccountError: Failed to delete account. Please try again.
settingsPage.deleteAccountSuccess: Your account has been scheduled for deletion. You will be logged out now.

reminderSettings.title: Deadlines & Reminders
reminderSettings.description: Choose how and when you want to be reminded about important tax deadlines.
reminderSettings.pushDescription: Get browser alerts when a deadline is approaching.
reminderSettings.leadDaysDescription: How many days before the deadline should we remind you?

deductions.title: Deduction Optimizer
deductions.description: Unlock extra tax savings with standard Norwegian ENK deductions.
deductions.homeOfficeDesc: Work from a dedicated room at home? You can claim ~{amount} NOK/year.
deductions.mileageDesc: Drive your personal car for work? Deduct per kilometer.
deductions.savingsDesc: By claiming these deductions, you reduce your taxable profit by {amount} NOK.
deductions.receiptNote: Note: Actual receipts (like internet) are already deducted in your 'Safe to Spend' logic.

taxInsights.title: AI Tax Assistant
taxInsights.privacy: Privacy: Local scanning in browser • No data leaves your machine

journal.title: Transaction Journal
journal.description: A chronological record of all recorded income and expenses. Use this to review or delete mistakes.
journal.exportUpgrade: Upgrade to Pro for unlimited exports
journal.noTransactions: No transactions found for this period.
journal.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this transaction? This will automatically adjust your year-to-date totals.
journal.deleteSuccess: Transaction deleted and YTD totals updated.

cfo.performanceDesc: Monthly breakdown of income vs. profit.
cfo.burdenDesc: Focus strictly on ENK economy. External salaries are excluded.
cfo.expenseDesc: Top spending categories for the current year.
cfo.preCheckDesc: Map your ENK values directly to the official Tax Return form.

legal.disclaimerText: ENK Pilot is an experimental decision-support tool provided 'as-is' for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for accounting, tax, or legal advice. By using this software, you acknowledge and agree that you are solely responsible for your own financial decisions and tax compliance. The developer(s) of ENK Pilot assume zero liability for any errors, omissions, financial losses, or tax penalties resulting from the use of this software, nor for any disruptions or data inaccuracies. Always verify calculations with a certified accountant and officially cross-check with Skatteetaten before filing.
legal.legalFootnote: Educational decision-support tool. Not tax advice. User assumes 100% financial and legal responsibility for all filings.

pricing.title: Upgrade to Pro
pricing.description: Unlock international currencies, audit-ready exports, and smart tax insight.
pricing.foundingPerks: Founding Badge, Priority Feature Requests, Beta Access

mfa.title: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)
mfa.description: Add an extra layer of security to your account by requiring a six-digit code from an authenticator app.
mfa.enrollStep1: 1. Scan the QR code with your authenticator app (e.g., Google Authenticator, Authy, or 1Password).
mfa.enrollStep2: 2. Enter the six-digit code from the app to confirm setup.
mfa.setupSuccess: 2FA is now enabled on your account.
mfa.setupError: Could not enable 2FA. Please try again.
mfa.proFeatureDesc: 2FA is a Pro feature. Upgrade to secure your account.
mfa.challengeDesc: Enter the code from your authenticator app to continue.

metadata.title: ENK Pilot | Never Get Tax Shocked as an ENK Again
metadata.description: ENK Pilot shows you exactly how much tax and VAT you need to set aside – and how much is safe to spend – in real-time. Built in Norway for Norwegian sole proprietors.

hero.title: ENK Pilot
hero.subtitle: Never Get Tax Shocked as an ENK Again
hero.description: ENK Pilot shows you exactly how much tax and VAT you need to set aside – and how much is safe to spend – in real-time.
hero.builtInNorway: Built in Norway for Norwegian sole proprietors. No commitment.

explainer.title: What is ENK Pilot?
explainer.description: ENK Pilot is a smart tax calculator and cash flow assistant for sole proprietors. You enter income and expenses, and it automatically calculates tax, VAT, and a safe buffer – so you always know what you can spend without getting into trouble with the Tax Authority.

step1.title: Enter Income and Expenses
step1.desc: Connect your account or register income and costs manually. ENK Pilot understands Norwegian ENK finances – including VAT liability, prepaid tax, and deductions.

step2.title: Tax, VAT, and Buffer Calculated Automatically
step2.desc: Based on sole proprietor regulations, the tool calculates how much you should set aside for prepaid tax, bracket tax, and employer contributions where relevant. The rest goes into your virtual tax and VAT vault.

step3.title: You See Your 'Safe to Spend' Balance in Real-Time
step3.desc: ENK Pilot always shows you how much is safe to spend, after tax and VAT are set aside. No more surprises when the Tax Authority comes calling.

features.title: Everything you need for safe ENK finances
features.description: Automated calculations and tools specifically designed for Norwegian sole proprietorships.
features.bufferTitle: Tax Buffer and 'Safe to Spend' Balance
features.buffer1: Tax buffer you can trust (based on Tax Authority rules)
features.buffer2: See what you can actually spend – one simple balance
features.buffer3: Automatic alerts when buffer gets too low
features.receiptsTitle: Receipt App for ENK – with AI
features.receipts1: Take photos of receipts directly in ENK Pilot
features.receipts2: Automatic extraction of amount, date, and vendor, with suggested category and VAT handling
features.receiptsPrivacy1: All AI scanning runs locally – no receipt images sent out
features.mvaTitle: Full Control of VAT and Deadlines
features.mva1: Tracks the 50,000 NOK threshold for VAT liability
features.mva2: Shows how much VAT you owe based on your sales
features.reminders1: Alerts before prepaid tax and VAT submission
features.reminders2: Avoid the guilt of missing deadlines
features.saft1: One click to format accountants understand
features.supplement1: ENK Pilot doesn't replace accounting, but provides overview and clean data

privacy.title: Privacy and Data Security
privacy.privacy1: Data stored securely in EU, complies with GDPR and Norwegian data protection law
privacy.privacy2: You own your data – export or delete anytime
privacy.subtitle2: Built for ENK Owners in Norway
privacy.built1: Created by an ENK owner who understands your pain
privacy.built2: Only financial data to help YOU, never sold or used for ads

security.title: Privacy first. <highlight>Local-First Intelligence</highlight>.
security.description: Encryption for your data and mandatory GDPR compliance. Smart Scanning and AI tasks happen directly in your browser—your sensitive financial documents never leave your device for processing.

cta.title: Ready to fly on <highlight>Autopilot</highlight>?
cta.description: Join other Norwegian founders who have stopped stressing about taxes.

faq.title: Frequently Asked <highlight>Questions</highlight>
faq.a1: No – this is a supplement for overview and tax buffer.
faq.a2: Based on Tax Authority rules for ENK: minimum tax, national insurance, bracket tax, VAT. Advanced calculator, not personal advice.
faq.a3: Yes – HTTPS, local AI scanning, EU data. Export/delete anytime.
faq.a4: Yes. Industry-standard encryption is used and all AI scanning happens locally in your browser. Your sensitive document content never leaves your device.
faq.a5: The service is completely free and provided as-is. You can delete your account and all your data at any time.
